import { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Dialog, Disclosure, Menu, Transition, RadioGroup, } from "@headlessui/react"; import { XMarkIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; import { ChevronDownIcon, FunnelIcon, MinusIcon, PlusIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/20/solid"; import Products from "./Products"; const sortOptions = [ { name: "Most Popular", href: "#", current: true }, { name: "Best Rating", href: "#", current: false }, { name: "Newest", href: "#", current: false }, { name: "Price: Low to High", href: "#", current: false }, { name: "Price: High to Low", href: "#", current: false }, ]; const allPrice = [ { amount: "0 - 50", }, { amount: "50 - 100", }, { amount: "100 - 150", }, { amount: "150 - 200", }, { amount: "200 - 250", }, { amount: "250 - 300", }, { amount: "300 - 350", }, { amount: "350 - 400", }, ]; function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(" "); } const sizeCategories = [ "XXS", "XS", "S", "M", "L", "XL", "XXL", "XXXL", "XXXXL", ]; export default function ProductsFilters() { const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [mobileFiltersOpen, setMobileFiltersOpen] = useState(false); let colorsLoading; let colorsError; let colors; let setPrice; let brands; let setSize; let setColor; let setBrand; let productsLoading; let productsError; let products; return (

)}
)} {/* price categories section */} {({ open }) => ( <>

Price {open ? ( ) : ( )}

{allPrice?.map((price) => (
setPrice(price?.amount)} name="price" type="radio" className="h-4 w-4 rounded border-gray-300 cursor-pointer text-indigo-600 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
))}
)} {/* end price categories section */} {/* product brand categories section categories section */} {({ open }) => ( <>

{brands?.map((brand) => (
setBrand(brand?.name)} name="brand" type="radio" className="h-4 w-4 rounded border-gray-300 text-indigo-600 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
))}
)} {/* end product brand categories section */} {/* product size categories */} {({ open }) => ( <>

{sizeCategories.map((option) => (
setSize(option)} className="h-4 w-4 rounded border-gray-300 text-indigo-600 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
))}
)} {/* end product size categories section */}
{/* end of mobile filters */}

Product Filters

)}
)} {/* colors end categories section */} {/* price categories section Desktop*/} {({ open }) => ( <>

{allPrice?.map((price) => (
setPrice(price?.amount)} name="price" type="radio" className="h-4 w-4 rounded border-gray-300 cursor-pointer text-indigo-600 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
))}
)} {/* end price categories section Desktop*/} {/* product brand categories section categories section */} {({ open }) => ( <>

{brands?.map((brand) => (
setBrand(brand?.name)} name="brand" type="radio" className="h-4 w-4 rounded border-gray-300 text-indigo-600 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
